00023 # #------------------------------ trigger matching
00024 #from PhysicsTools.PatAlgos.triggerLayer1.triggerMatcher_cfi.py import *
00025 PatElectronTriggerMatchHLTEle_Ele20SC4Mass50v7 = cms.EDProducer(
00026     "PATTriggerMatcherDRDPtLessByR"                 # match by DeltaR only, best match by DeltaR
00027     , src     = cms.InputTag( "patElectrons" )
00028     , matched = cms.InputTag( "patTrigger" )          # default producer label as defined in PhysicsTools/PatAlgos/python/triggerLayer1/triggerProducer_cfi.py
00029     , matchedCuts = cms.string( 'path( "HLT_Ele20_CaloIdVT_CaloIsoVT_TrkIdT_TrkIsoVT_SC4_Mass50_v7" )' )
00030     , maxDPtRel = cms.double( 0.5 )
00031     , maxDeltaR = cms.double( 0.5 )
00032     , resolveAmbiguities    = cms.bool( True )        # only one match per trigger object
00033     , resolveByMatchQuality = cms.bool( True )        # take best match found per reco object: by DeltaR here (s. above)
00034     )
